description: After fighting in the war, Kyuuzou landed a job as an elite guard in http://anidb.net/ch3952 [Ayamaro]`s house. A rare master of the double-sword technique, Kyuuzou spends his days in silence, pursuing fighting perfection, while having to listen to the Ayamaro and his son http://anidb.net/ch3951 [Ukyou] brag about the end of the samurai. He leaves Ayamaro and joins the team to test his skills and to prove that samurai still have a purpose. However, most of all, he joins the team to stay close to http://anidb.net/ch3954 [Kanbee], waiting for the day the two can fight to the death.
name: Kyuuzou
